messages.subject: Re: is it possible to unschool if both parents work?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Just catching up on my digests for the last two days, and I m not certain if anyone ever responded to this question. Moon, you ve only been with us since
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, "moonwindstarsky"
<moonwindstarsky@y...> wrote:
> my parents are busy during the wk

Just catching up on my digests for the last two days, and I'm not
certain if anyone ever responded to this question.

Moon, you've only been with us since August, right? And I take it
from this post that you are the young person in the family? And both
your parents work?

Tell us more about how you came to be unschooling and what your
situation is, would you?

It certainly is possible to unschool while your parents work, but it
doesn't sound like you're too happy with it. Have I read you wrong?

Speaking of reading, have you read The Teenage Liberation Handbook by
Grace Llewellyn?

Also, how old are you? We have lots of lists for unschooled
teenagers that you might like too.

Peace,
Laura B.
